data.title: Really Beautiful Church with a lot of history
data.text: Really beautiful church with lots of history. If you are visiting and wish to attend Mass, this is the place.

data.title: Can't miss this wonderful Church
data.text:
If you haven't discovered the hidden gems of Birmingham, start at The Cathedral of St Paul in the safe revitalizing downtown area. Built by poor, hard working Irish and Italian immigrants and maintained for over a century by its vibrant parishioners, St Pauls  
represents the best of the best.

Regardless of your faith, interests or race, St Pauls has something for you. The architecture, the unique stained glass windows, the statuary, the organ, the perfect acoustics, carillon tower or the gardens are all worth the visit.

data.title: Wonderful visit
data.text: We arrived on Saturday afternoon in time for confession. Beautiful building with wonderful icons. Quiet place for reflection.

data.title: Small but stunning
data.text: We were showing around in Birmingham to my parents and friends. We stopped in St. Paul where the were choir practice going on. We loved the 2 windows and this amazing red colour. It added solemnity to the place. We stayed 15 minutes and enjoyed the choir practising their songs.

data.title: Historical landmark, visit this architectural beauty!
data.text: We visited on a weekday during the lunch hour. Members were coming in and out of the sanctuary for prayer and confession. Everyone so very welcoming, especially the staff that we caught off guard.

data.title: Noon Mass During Lent
data.text: The church is old world. Very beautiful on the inside with real and faux architectual offerings. The atmosphere is wonderful for the worship of our Lord. Old wooden pews, pipe organ and a beautiful alter.

data.title: Beautiful Cathedral
data.text: This is a gorgeous Cathedral and well maintained.  Worth the time to walk around inside and observe the architecture.

data.title: Beautiful Cathedral
data.text: It's an old and beautiful church in downtown Birmingham, AL. I did not visit during a service, however I did go inside and it's gorgeous.

data.title: Cerimonia
data.text:
La Cattedrale di St. Paul e' in downtown di Birmingham alle spalle della First presbiterian church. Ho avuto modo di assistere alla messa della Domenica delle Palme ed è' stata una cerimonia molto suggestiva, concelebrata dal vescovo e dal superiore dei presbiteriani.
La chiesa non e' molto grande all'interno, anche se arricchirà con vetri colorati ed impreziositi da disegni riportati.
La cerimonia rispetta in tutto e per tutto il rito romano.
